description: Try our easy to follow Mango Macadamia Loaf recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Mango Macadamia Loaf Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180°C. Grease and line a 22x12cm loaf pan.
Cut cheeks from mangoes and scoop out flesh. Dice half and set aside. Trim remaining flesh from around the stone.
purée mango flesh in a food processor until smooth. Add oil, eggs and vanilla. Process to combine.
Sift flour, baking powder and spices together in a large bowl. Stir in sugar, coconut and macadamias, reserving 30g of nuts. Make a well in the centre. Add mango mixture. Stir to combine.

Transfer to prepared pan. Top with reserved mango and macadamias and extra coconut. Bake for 1 hour 10 minutes or until cooked when tested with a skewer. Cool in pan for 10 minutes then turn out onto a wire rack to cool completely. Cut into slices and serve with butter, if desired.
